mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, H.* FROM ( SELECT AA.ORDERNO, AA.ORDERNO AS ORDERS_ORDERNO, AA.USER_NM ORDERS_USERNAME, AA.USER_ID AS ORDERS_USERID, BB.USERNAME DELIVERS_USERNAME, AA.TEL_NO AS ORDERS_TELNO, AA.PHONE_NO AS ORDERS_CELLNO, AA.ZIP_CODE AS ORDERS_ZIPCD, AA.ADDRESS1 || AA.ADDRESS2 AS ORDERS_ADDR, AA.EMAIL AS ORDERS_EMAIL, DD.PAYCODE APPROVALS_PAYCODENAME, DD.ADDPRICE APPROVALS_ADDPRICE, DD.PAYNAME, BB.REGDATE, CC.ISCONFIRM DELIVERS_REGDATE FROM TB_ORDERS AA, TB_DELIVERS BB, (SELECT TO_CHAR(A.ISCONFIRM, 'YYYYMMDD') ISCONFIRM, A.ORDERNO FROM TB_ORDER_MGNT_NO A, TB_CA_BOOK B WHERE A.MGNTNO = B.RSC_ID AND A.STATUSCODE IN ('DLV105') AND TO_CHAR(A.ISCONFIRM, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN #{sdate} AND #{edate} GROUP BY TO_CHAR(A.ISCONFIRM, 'YYYYMMDD'), A.ORDERNO) CC, TB_APPROVALS DD WHERE AA.ORDERNO = BB.ORDERNO AND AA.ORDERNO = CC.ORDERNO AND NVL(BB.DLEORDER, 'DLE100') = 'DLE100' AND AA.ORDERNO = DD.ORDERNO
AND INSTR(${searchtype}, #{searchkey}) > 0
AND ( INSTR(AA.ORDERNO, #{searchkey}) > 0 OR INSTR(AA.USER_ID, #{searchkey}) > 0 OR INSTR(AA.USER_NM, #{searchkey}) > 0 OR INSTR(BB.USERNAME, #{searchkey}) > 0 OR INSTR(DD.PAYNAME, #{searchkey}) > 0 )
ORDER BY CC.ISCONFIRM ASC, AA.ORDERNO ASC ) H WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endNo} ) WHERE RNUM > #{startNo}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_ORDERS AA, TB_DELIVERS BB, (SELECT A.ORDERNO FROM TB_ORDER_MGNT_NO A, TB_CA_BOOK B WHERE A.MGNTNO = B.RSC_ID AND A.STATUSCODE IN ('DLV105') AND TO_CHAR(A.ISCONFIRM, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN #{sdate} AND #{edate} GROUP BY A.ORDERNO) CC, TB_APPROVALS DD WHERE AA.ORDERNO = BB.ORDERNO AND AA.ORDERNO = CC.ORDERNO AND NVL(BB.DLEORDER, 'DLE100') = 'DLE100' AND AA.ORDERNO = DD.ORDERNO
AND INSTR(${searchtype}, #{searchkey}) > 0
AND ( INSTR(AA.ORDERNO, #{searchkey}) > 0 OR INSTR(AA.USER_ID, #{searchkey}) > 0 OR INSTR(AA.USER_NM, #{searchkey}) > 0 OR INSTR(BB.USERNAME, #{searchkey}) > 0 OR INSTR(DD.PAYNAME, #{searchkey}) > 0 )

select b.book_nm name , a.cnt , a.price , b.rsc_id mgntNo , b.book_author author from tb_order_mgnt_no a, TB_CA_BOOK b where a.orderNo = #{orderno} and a.mgntNo = b.rsc_id and a.statuscode IN ('DLV105', 'DLV110', 'DLV120', 'DLV125', 'DLV130')

SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, AA.ORDERNO, AA.ORDERNO AS ORDERS_ORDERNO, AA.USER_NM ORDERS_USERNAME, AA.USER_ID AS ORDERS_USERID, BB.USERNAME DELIVERS_USERNAME, BB.TELNO AS DELIVERS_TELNO, BB.CELLNO AS DELIVERS_CELLNO, BB.ZIPCD AS DELIVERS_ZIPCD, BB.ADDR AS DELIVERS_ADDR, AA.EMAIL AS ORDERS_EMAIL, BB.MEMO DELIVERS_MEMO, DD.PAYCODE APPROVALS_PAYCODENAME, DD.ADDPRICE APPROVALS_ADDPRICE, DD.PAYNAME, FN_GET_MULTI_BOOK_NM(AA.ORDERNO) MULTI_BOOK_NM, TO_CHAR(BB.REGDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') TO_DATE FROM TB_ORDERS AA, TB_DELIVERS BB, (SELECT A.ORDERNO FROM TB_ORDER_MGNT_NO A, TB_CA_BOOK B WHERE A.MGNTNO = B.RSC_ID AND A.STATUSCODE IN ('DLV105') AND TO_CHAR(A.ISCONFIRM, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN #{sdate} AND #{edate} GROUP BY A.ORDERNO) CC, TB_APPROVALS DD WHERE AA.ORDERNO = BB.ORDERNO AND AA.ORDERNO = CC.ORDERNO AND NVL(BB.DLEORDER, 'DLE100') = 'DLE100' AND AA.ORDERNO = DD.ORDERNO
AND INSTR(${searchtype}, #{searchkey}) > 0
AND ( INSTR(AA.ORDERNO, #{searchkey}) > 0 OR INSTR(AA.USER_ID, #{searchkey}) > 0 OR INSTR(AA.USER_NM, #{searchkey}) > 0 OR INSTR(BB.USERNAME, #{searchkey}) > 0 OR INSTR(DD.PAYNAME, #{searchkey}) > 0 )
ORDER BY BB.REGDATE ASC, AA.ORDERNO ASC

select b.price, a.addPrice, a.payCode payCodeName, case when (a.payCode = 'PAY120') then a.Vacct else a.payCode end as acctNoName, case when (a.vcdbank = '') then null else a.vcdbank end as VcdBank, a.payName, a.paycode, a.point, a.returnValue, a.vacct, CASE WHEN a.payCode = 'PAY120' THEN DECODE((select statuscode from tb_order_mgnt_no where orderno = #{orderno} and rownum = 1),'DLV105',TO_CHAR((SELECT ISCONFIRM FROM TB_ORDER_MGNT_NO DD WHERE DD.ORDERNO =#{orderno} AND ROWNUM=1),'YYYY-MM-DD.HH24:MI.SS'),'') ELSE '' END STATUS_DT from tb_approvals a, ( select orderNo, sum(price*cnt) price from tb_order_mgnt_no where orderNo = #{orderno} group by orderNo ) b where a.orderNo = #{orderno} and a.orderNo = b.orderNo

select a.sendNo, a.userName, a.telNo, a.cellNo, a.zipcd, SUBSTR(a.zipcd,1,3) zipcd_set1, decode(length(a.zipcd), 6, SUBSTR(a.zipcd,4,3), SUBSTR(a.zipcd,5,3)) zipcd_set2, a.addr, a.memo, a.sendDate, a.dleorder, DECODE(a.dleorder,'DLE100','택배수령','DLE110','직접수령',NULL,'택배수령') DLEORDER_NM from tb_delivers a where a.orderNo = #{orderno}

select TO_CHAR(a.REG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss') REG_DT, a.USER_NM, a.TEL_NO, a.PHONE_NO, a.ZIP_CODE, a.ADDRESS1, a.EMAIL, b.BIRTH_DAY birth_dt from tb_orders a left outer join TB_MA_MEMBER b on a.USER_ID = b.USER_ID where a.orderNo = #{orderno}
mapper.update: update tb_delivers set sendNo = #{sendno}, username = #{d_name}, telno = #{d_telno}, cellno = #{d_cellno}, zipcd = #{zipcd}, addr = #{juso}, memo = #{d_memo} where orderNo = #{orderno}
update tb_delivers set sendNo = #{sendno}, sendDate = sysdate where orderNo = #{orderno}
update tb_order_mgnt_no set statusCode = 'DLV125' where PTYPE = 'L' and orderNo = #{orderno}

choose.when: select a.rsc_id mgntNo, '도서' gbnName, a.book_nm name, A.DISCOUNT_PRICE REALPRICE, a.DISCOUNT rate, a.PRICE, a.book_author, b.cnt, b.statusCode , (a.DISCOUNT_PRICE * b.cnt) tot_price, b.statusCode statusCodeName from TB_CA_BOOK a, tb_order_mgnt_no b where a.rsc_id = b.mgntNo and b.orderNo = #{orderno} and b.statusCode in ('DLV105')
choose.otherwise: select a.leccode mgntNo, '도서' gbnName, a.subject_title name, a.SUBJECT_PRICE price, a.SUBJECT_DISCOUNT rate, a.SUBJECT_PRICE realPrice, b.cnt, b.statusCode , (a.SUBJECT_PRICE * b.cnt) tot_price, b.statusCode statusCodeName from TB_LEC_MST a, tb_order_mgnt_no b where a.leccode = b.mgntNo and b.orderNo = #{orderno}

mapper.select: select a.sendNo , a.userName , c.BIRTH_DAY , a.telno , a.cellno , a.zipcd , a.addr , a.memo , b.statusCode , TO_CHAR(a.sendDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') sendDate , a.dleorder , DECODE(a.dleorder,'DLE100','택배수령','DLE110','직접수령',NULL,'택배수령') DLEORDER_NM from TB_DELIVERS a, tb_order_mgnt_no b, (select a.orderno,a.USER_ID userid, bb.BIRTH_DAY from tb_orders a left outer join (select USER_ID userid, BIRTH_DAY from TB_MA_MEMBER) bb on a.USER_ID = bb.userid) c where a.orderNo = #{orderno} and a.orderNo = b.orderNo and rownum =1

select a.USER_ID userid ,a.USER_NM username ,b.BIRTH_DAY ,a.TEL_NO telno ,a.PHONE_NO cellno ,a.ZIP_CODE zipcd ,a.ADDRESS1 || ADDRESS2 addr , a.email ,TO_CHAR(a.REG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss') regdate ,TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss') to_date from tb_orders a LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT USER_ID userid, BIRTH_DAY FROM TB_MA_MEMBER ) b on a.USER_ID = b.userid where a.orderNo = #{orderno}

SELECT COUNT(*) from tb_orders a left join tb_delivers b on a.orderNo = b.orderNo, tb_approvals c where c.orderNo = a.orderNo and a.orderNo in (select distinct aa.orderNo from tb_order_mgnt_no aa, TB_CA_BOOK bb where aa.orderNo = a.orderNo and aa.mgntNo = bb.rsc_id and aa.statusCode in ('DLV105', 'DLV110', 'DLV120', 'DLV130')) and (b.dleorder = 'DLE110') and TO_CHAR(a.REG_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') between #{sdate} and #{edate}
and ${searchtype} like '%'||#{searchkey}||'%'
and ( a.orderNo like '%'||#{searchkey}||'%' or a.USER_ID like '%'||#{searchkey}||'%' or a.USER_NM like '%'||#{searchkey}||'%' or b.username like '%'||#{searchkey}||'%' or c.payName like '%'||#{searchkey}||'%' )
order by a.ipDate asc , a.orderNo asc
mapper.update: update tb_delivers set sendNo = '9999999999', sendDate = sysdate where orderNo = #{orderno}
update tb_order_mgnt_no set statusCode = 'DLV130' where PTYPE = 'L' and orderNo = #{orderno}

and ${searchtype} like '%'||#{searchkey}||'%'
and ${searchtype} like '%'||#{searchkey}||'%'
) a, tb_delivers b, tb_orders c, tb_approvals d where a.orderNo = b.orderNo and b.orderNo = c.orderNo and c.orderNo = d.orderNo
and TO_CHAR(b.sendDate, 'YYYYMMDD') between #{sdate} and #{edate}
and ${searchtype} like '%'||#{searchkey}||'%'
and ( b.orderNo like '%'||#{searchkey}||'%' or c.USER_ID like '%'||#{searchkey}||'%' or c.USER_NM like '%'||#{searchkey}||'%' or b.username like '%'||#{searchkey}||'%' or d.payName like '%'||#{searchkey}||'%' )

select b.book_nm name , a.cnt , b.rsc_id mgntNo , b.book_author as author , b.book_publishers , b.price , b.discount_price from tb_order_mgnt_no a, TB_CA_BOOK b where a.orderNo = #{orderno} and a.mgntNo = b.rsc_id and a.statusCode IN ('DLV120', 'DLV125', 'DLV130')

select ROWNUM RNUM , b.orderNo , c.USER_ID userid , c.USER_NM username , b.userName deliveName , case when nvl(b.cellNo, '') = '' then b.telNo else b.cellNo end cellNo , b.zipcd , b.addr , TO_CHAR(b.sendDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') sendDate , b.sendNo , d.addPrice from ( select distinct ta.orderNo from tb_order_mgnt_no ta, TB_CA_BOOK tb where ta.mgntNo = tb.rsc_id and ta.statusCode IN ('DLV120', 'DLV125', 'DLV130')
and ${searchtype} like '%'||#{searchkey}||'%'
and ${searchtype} like '%'||#{searchkey}||'%'
) a, tb_delivers b, tb_orders c, tb_approvals d where a.orderNo = b.orderNo and b.orderNo = c.orderNo and c.orderNo = d.orderNo
and TO_CHAR(b.sendDate, 'YYYYMMDD') between #{sdate} and #{edate}
and ${searchtype} like '%'||#{searchkey}||'%'
and ( b.orderNo like '%'||#{searchkey}||'%' or c.USER_ID like '%'||#{searchkey}||'%' or c.USER_NM like '%'||#{searchkey}||'%' or b.username like '%'||#{searchkey}||'%' or d.payName like '%'||#{searchkey}||'%' )
order by b.sendDate desc

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, H.* FROM ( SELECT AA.ORDERNO, AA.ORDERNO AS ORDERS_ORDERNO, AA.USER_NM ORDERS_USERNAME, AA.USER_ID AS ORDERS_USERID, BB.USERNAME DELIVERS_USERNAME, AA.TEL_NO AS ORDERS_TELNO, AA.PHONE_NO AS ORDERS_CELLNO, AA.ZIP_CODE AS ORDERS_ZIPCD, AA.ADDRESS1 || AA.ADDRESS2 AS ORDERS_ADDR, AA.EMAIL AS ORDERS_EMAIL, DD.PAYCODE APPROVALS_PAYCODENAME, DD.ADDPRICE APPROVALS_ADDPRICE, DD.PAYNAME, BB.REGDATE, CC.ISCONFIRM DELIVERS_REGDATE FROM TB_ORDERS@WILLBESGOSI_NEW AA, TB_DELIVERS@WILLBESGOSI_NEW BB, (SELECT TO_CHAR(A.ISCONFIRM, 'YYYYMMDD') ISCONFIRM, A.ORDERNO FROM TB_ORDER_MGNT_NO@WILLBESGOSI_NEW A, TB_CA_BOOK@WILLBESGOSI_NEW B WHERE A.MGNTNO = B.RSC_ID AND A.STATUSCODE IN ('DLV105') AND TO_CHAR(A.ISCONFIRM, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN #{sdate} AND #{edate} GROUP BY TO_CHAR(A.ISCONFIRM, 'YYYYMMDD'), A.ORDERNO) CC, TB_APPROVALS@WILLBESGOSI_NEW DD WHERE AA.ORDERNO = BB.ORDERNO AND AA.ORDERNO = CC.ORDERNO AND NVL(BB.DLEORDER, 'DLE100') = 'DLE100' AND AA.ORDERNO = DD.ORDERNO
AND INSTR(${searchtype}, #{searchkey}) > 0
AND ( INSTR(AA.ORDERNO, #{searchkey}) > 0 OR INSTR(AA.USER_ID, #{searchkey}) > 0 OR INSTR(AA.USER_NM, #{searchkey}) > 0 OR INSTR(BB.USERNAME, #{searchkey}) > 0 OR INSTR(DD.PAYNAME, #{searchkey}) > 0 )
ORDER BY CC.ISCONFIRM ASC, AA.ORDERNO ASC ) H WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endNo} ) WHERE RNUM > #{startNo}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_ORDERS@WILLBESGOSI_NEW AA, TB_DELIVERS@WILLBESGOSI_NEW BB, (SELECT A.ORDERNO FROM TB_ORDER_MGNT_NO@WILLBESGOSI_NEW A, TB_CA_BOOK@WILLBESGOSI_NEW B WHERE A.MGNTNO = B.RSC_ID AND A.STATUSCODE IN ('DLV105') AND TO_CHAR(A.ISCONFIRM, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN #{sdate} AND #{edate} GROUP BY A.ORDERNO) CC, TB_APPROVALS@WILLBESGOSI_NEW DD WHERE AA.ORDERNO = BB.ORDERNO AND AA.ORDERNO = CC.ORDERNO AND NVL(BB.DLEORDER, 'DLE100') = 'DLE100' AND AA.ORDERNO = DD.ORDERNO
AND INSTR(${searchtype}, #{searchkey}) > 0
AND ( INSTR(AA.ORDERNO, #{searchkey}) > 0 OR INSTR(AA.USER_ID, #{searchkey}) > 0 OR INSTR(AA.USER_NM, #{searchkey}) > 0 OR INSTR(BB.USERNAME, #{searchkey}) > 0 OR INSTR(DD.PAYNAME, #{searchkey}) > 0 )

SELECT B.BOOK_NM NAME , A.CNT , A.PRICE , B.RSC_ID MGNTNO , B.BOOK_AUTHOR AUTHOR FROM TB_ORDER_MGNT_NO@WILLBESGOSI_NEW A, TB_CA_BOOK@WILLBESGOSI_NEW B WHERE A.ORDERNO = #{orderno} AND A.MGNTNO = B.RSC_ID AND A.STATUSCODE IN ('DLV105', 'DLV110', 'DLV120', 'DLV125', 'DLV130')

SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, AA.ORDERNO, AA.ORDERNO AS ORDERS_ORDERNO, AA.USER_NM ORDERS_USERNAME, AA.USER_ID AS ORDERS_USERID, BB.USERNAME DELIVERS_USERNAME, BB.TELNO AS DELIVERS_TELNO, BB.CELLNO AS DELIVERS_CELLNO, BB.ZIPCD AS DELIVERS_ZIPCD, BB.ADDR AS DELIVERS_ADDR, AA.EMAIL AS ORDERS_EMAIL, BB.MEMO DELIVERS_MEMO, DD.PAYCODE APPROVALS_PAYCODENAME, DD.ADDPRICE APPROVALS_ADDPRICE, DD.PAYNAME, FN_GET_MULTI_BOOK_NM@WILLBESGOSI_NEW(AA.ORDERNO) MULTI_BOOK_NM, TO_CHAR(BB.REGDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') TO_DATE FROM TB_ORDERS@WILLBESGOSI_NEW AA, TB_DELIVERS@WILLBESGOSI_NEW BB, (SELECT A.ORDERNO FROM TB_ORDER_MGNT_NO@WILLBESGOSI_NEW A, TB_CA_BOOK@WILLBESGOSI_NEW B WHERE A.MGNTNO = B.RSC_ID AND A.STATUSCODE IN ('DLV105') AND TO_CHAR(A.ISCONFIRM, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN #{sdate} AND #{edate} GROUP BY A.ORDERNO) CC, TB_APPROVALS@WILLBESGOSI_NEW DD WHERE AA.ORDERNO = BB.ORDERNO AND AA.ORDERNO = CC.ORDERNO AND NVL(BB.DLEORDER, 'DLE100') = 'DLE100' AND AA.ORDERNO = DD.ORDERNO
AND INSTR(${searchtype}, #{searchkey}) > 0
AND ( INSTR(AA.ORDERNO, #{searchkey}) > 0 OR INSTR(AA.USER_ID, #{searchkey}) > 0 OR INSTR(AA.USER_NM, #{searchkey}) > 0 OR INSTR(BB.USERNAME, #{searchkey}) > 0 OR INSTR(DD.PAYNAME, #{searchkey}) > 0 )
ORDER BY BB.REGDATE ASC, AA.ORDERNO ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_DELIVERS@WILLBESGOSI_NEW SET SENDNO = #{sendno}, SENDDATE = SYSDATE WHERE ORDERNO = #{orderno}
UPDATE TB_ORDER_MGNT_NO@WILLBESGOSI_NEW SET STATUSCODE = 'DLV125' WHERE PTYPE = 'L' AND ORDERNO = #{orderno}
mapper.select: SELECT A.RSC_ID MGNTNO, B.SDATE, C.ORDERNO, C.USER_ID USERID, '도서' GBNNAME, A.BOOK_NM NAME, A.PRICE PRICE, A.DISCOUNT RATE, B.PRICE REALPRICE, B.CNT, B.STATUSCODE, '도서' WMV_PMP, (B.PRICE) TOT_PRICE, B.STATUSCODE STATUSCODENAME, NVL(B.DISCOUNTPER,0) DISCOUNTPER, B.ISCANCEL FROM TB_CA_BOOK@WILLBESGOSI_NEW A, TB_ORDER_MGNT_NO@WILLBESGOSI_NEW B, TB_ORDERS@WILLBESGOSI_NEW C WHERE A.RSC_ID = B.MGNTNO AND B.ORDERNO = C.ORDERNO AND C.ORDERNO = #{orderno}

SELECT A.SENDNO, A.USERNAME, A.TELNO, A.CELLNO, A.ZIPCD, SUBSTR(A.ZIPCD,1,3) ZIPCD_SET1, DECODE(LENGTH(A.ZIPCD), 6, SUBSTR(A.ZIPCD,4,3), SUBSTR(A.ZIPCD,5,3)) ZIPCD_SET2, A.ADDR, A.MEMO, A.SENDDATE, A.DLEORDER, DECODE(A.DLEORDER,'DLE100','택배수령','DLE110','직접수령',NULL,'택배수령') DLEORDER_NM FROM TB_DELIVERS@WILLBESGOSI_NEW A WHERE A.ORDERNO = #{orderno}
